title: Harvest and Process Hundreds of Tons of Pomegranates - Amazing Modern Agricultural Technology

tasks.task: Explore a farm and harvest pomegranates.
subtasks: Walk through a farm full of pomegranate trees.
Use specialized scissors to cut pomegranates from branches.
Handle pomegranates carefully to avoid damaging the skin.
Inspect pomegranates for ripeness, checking color, plumpness, and weight.
Describe the nutritional value of pomegranates, including vitamins C and K and antioxidants.
Mention the health benefits of pomegranate juice, such as fighting oxidation and improving heart health.
Discuss soil requirements for pomegranate trees (loose, nutrient-rich, pH 6.5-7.5).
Describe planting methods, including using three-month-old seedlings spaced adequately.
Explain irrigation methods for pomegranates (drip irrigation for consistency and water conservation).
Explain the timing of pomegranate harvest (120-130 days after fruit sets).
Describe the careful hand-picking process using scissors.
Mention the rejection of underdeveloped fruits during harvest.
